title: Ambition Coffee & Eatery
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu has many vegetarian items and reported kitchen is open to customizations, ie make a lunch sandwich vegan by substituting meat and cheese for something else. The green street wrap comes with roasted vegetables and lemon hummus. The west coast hippie wrap (minus provolone cheese) uses mushrooms and a balsamic reduction. Keeps alternative milk on hand for drinks.
